rules.failed_sql_sample:
SELECT icu.SUBJECT_ID, icu.HADM_ID
FROM ICUSTAYS icu
JOIN LABEVENTS lab ON icu.SUBJECT_ID = lab.SUBJECT_ID AND icu.HADM_ID = lab.HADM_ID
JOIN D_LABITEMS dlab ON lab.ITEMID = dlab.ITEMID
WHERE dlab.LABEL = 'Phosphate'
  AND lab.CHARTTIME BETWEEN icu.INTIME AND icu.INTIME + INTERVAL '24' HOUR
  AND EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM LABEVENTS lab2
    WHERE lab2.SUBJECT_ID = icu.SUBJECT_ID
      AND lab2.HADM_ID = icu.HADM_ID
      AND lab2.ITEMID = lab.ITEMID
      AND lab2.CHARTTIME BETWEEN icu.INTI
rules.fixed_sql:
SELECT icu.SUBJECT_ID, icu.HADM_ID
FROM ICUSTAYS icu
JOIN LABEVENTS lab ON icu.SUBJECT_ID = lab.SUBJECT_ID AND icu.HADM_ID = lab.HADM_ID
JOIN D_LABITEMS dlab ON lab.ITEMID = dlab.ITEMID
WHERE dlab.LABEL = 'Phosphate'
  AND lab.CHARTTIME BETWEEN icu.INTIME AND icu.INTIME + INTERVAL '24' HOUR
  AND EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM LABEVENTS lab2
    WHERE lab2.SUBJECT_ID = icu.SUBJECT_ID
      AND lab2.HADM_ID = icu.HADM_ID
      AND lab2.ITEMID = lab.ITEMID
      AND lab2.CHARTTIME BETWEEN icu.INTIME AND icu.INTIME + INTERVAL '24' HOUR
    GROUP BY TRUNC((CAST(lab2.CHARTTIME AS DATE) - CAST(icu.INTIME AS DATE)) * 24 / 6)
    HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT TRUNC((CAST(lab2.CHARTTIME AS DATE) - CAST(icu.INTIME AS DATE)) * 24 / 6)) >= 4
  )
  AND ROWNUM = 1
